SpTB03a - Letters to Sanitarium Workers in Southern California (1905)


                   Introduction. 

     The Lord says to the leaders in our medical work:-- 
     "Places that have been neglected are now to receive attention. My people are to do a sharp, quick work. Those who with purity of purpose fully consecrate themselves to Me, body, soul, and spirit, shall work in My way and in My name. Every one shall stand in his lot, looking to Me, his Guide and Counselor.
